content:
Hey @WG-async-foundations - I just put up a PR adding more how to help guidance. The idea is to have a clear chain from the welcome page to the roadmap and any goals or initiatives there that are looking for help. One of the ideas I had was to add a :working_on_it: emoji for each goal/initiative with area-specific how to help or getting started instructions available. I included a link for polish, but I'd love to include links for other areas as well.

So, if you have instructions for you area already, let me know and I'll be sure to add a link. If you don't have how to help instructions, it'd be great to add some!

I'm also open to feedback for better ways to organize this information if anyone has ideas.
